solution_list.title: Pydio for Manufacturing
solution_list.description: Manufacturers rely on a huge number of processes, documentation, and technical notes. Embed Pydio Cells as a cornerstone inside your existing workflow to streamline and securitize document sharing and collaboration.

similar_software_list.title: Imagen
Pydio for Architecture & Construction Industry
similar_software_list.description: Use Pydio to upload, share and collaborate on large files. In your business, you need to exchange and collaborate on huge CAD files and manage piles of documents (field reports, specifications, RFIs, RFPs, etc..).

similar_software_list.title: wimi
Pydio for Healthcare
similar_software_list.description: Use Pydio as the cornerstone for file-sharing and collaboration in your existing workflow. Healthcare organizations need to centralize, secure, and manage patient data (test results, radiography images, lab protocols, etc…)

similar_software_list.title: oneHub
Pydio for Legal Services
similar_software_list.description: Pydio Cells provides streamlined, secure, self-hosted document sharing and collaboration adapted for the needs of the legal services sector, so you don’t have to choose between teamwork and security.

similar_software_list.title: moveit
Pydio for Financial Services
similar_software_list.description: Pydio Cells lets you build your own secure document repository for confidential data in hours. Pydio is built for security from the ground up and perfectly balances granular security and admin capabilities with end-user ease-of-use.

similar_software_list.title: globalscape EFT
Pydio for Government & Public Sector
similar_software_list.description: Use Pydio as your cross-department and inter-agency file-sharing platform. You are a government agency and you need to collaborate and share internally but also with other departments and agencies, partners, subcontractors, stakeholders, and the public.

similar_software_list.title: FileInvite
Pydio for Media & Communication agencies
similar_software_list.description: Share documents and collaborate with your teams, clients and subcontractors using your own branded platform. Your business is project-oriented.

similar_software_list.title: OnBoard
Pydio for Education & Academic Institutions
similar_software_list.description: Pydio provides a secured file sharing solution for sensitive staff and researcher data and an open, public cloud solution for students day-to-day collaboration.

similar_software_list.title: MangoApps
Pydio for Consulting Firms
similar_software_list.description: Pydio Cells helps you create, collaborate and share documents and files with your clients seamlessly and securely while keeping full control and ownership of your files.

similar_software_list.title: GoAnywhereMFT
Pydio for Retail & Consumer Goods
similar_software_list.description: Streamline your document sharing and collaboration workflows across all channels. Make it easy for central headquarters to collaborate with distribution, local shops, suppliers, and subcontractors. Instantly share files across all locations to smooth out workflows with your sales points.

success_case_list.title: ONLYOFFICE announces partnership and integration with Pydio
success_case_list.description: ONLYOFFICE has officially entered a technical partnership with Pydio, an open-source sharing system for private infrastructures. Now Pydio can accommodate ONLYOFFICE editors for collaborating on documents, sheets and presentations, using the newly released connector/plugin. Read this post to learn what is Pydio and why this integration is important.
